fullplot: It's April the 1st and Sylvia has made a fatal error. Abandoned by her boyfriend she sets out to the streets of Prague to win his love back. Overcoming one obstacle after another she heads toward a final collision. This day she'd rather start all over again.
plot: It's April the 1st and Sylvia has made a fatal error. Abandoned by her boyfriend she sets out to the streets of Prague to win his love back.
title: Restart
